404-seo-description: The page you have requested is not found
blog-seo-description: Habichat regularly publishes blog posts about our brand, research and development, upcoming events, and our views on important matters.
community-seo-description: Welcome to the community! Find out what's going on in your neighbourhood.
landing-seo-description: Habichat is Canada's Social Network - it's the place to stay in touch with your neighbours and connect with people nearby.
landing-subtext: There is a lot going on in your neighborhood, Habichat allows you to connect, share and stay informed about everything that is happening in your community.
landing-onboard-1-title: Social media connects you to the people who live a world away...
landing-onboard-1-body: It's incredible that we can stay in touch with family and friends who live in other countries, the world has become a more accessible place thanks to social media and the internet.
landing-onboard-2-title: ...habichat connects you to the people who live next door!
landing-onboard-2-body: Habichat makes it easy to plan local events, make new friends, sell items, ask for advice, find local services, and stay informed about everything happening in your neighbourhood.
landing-onboard-3-body: Click below to find your neighbourhood and start connecting with your community!
privacy-seo-description: How Habichat gathers, uses, discloses, and manages your data. Please read this information carefully - Habichat believes in transparency and the right to personal privacy.
privacy-2: Your privacy is important to us. It is Habichat's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, https://habi.chat, and our app.
privacy-3: We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used.
privacy-4: We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorised access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
privacy-5: We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law.
privacy-6: Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies.
privacy-7: You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services.
privacy-8: Your continued use of our app and / or website will be regarded as acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, feel free to contact us.
privacy-9: This policy is effective as of 05 May 2020.
recaptcha-seo-description: A turing test to tell human and bots apart.
styleguide-seo-description: A styleguide for the Habichat Design System.
terms-seo-description: In order to protect our property and yours, please read our contract for acceptable use of both the Habichat website which defines the accepted agreement for using our site.
terms-3: By accessing either the iOS or Android applicaton 'Habichat' or the website at https://habi.chat, you are agreeing to be bound by these terms of service, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site. The materials contained in this website are protected by applicable copyright and trademark law.

terms-8: Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on Habichat's app and/or website.
terms-9: remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials or

Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the termination of this license, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed format.

terms-16: In no event shall Habichat or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Habichat's app and/or website, even if Habichat or a Habichat authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.
